# Excitatory Neuron

```{r}
sub_name <- "Ex"
seurat_list <- readRDS(
  file.path(cache_dir, "..", "03", paste(sub_name, "seurat_list.rds", sep = "_"))
)
```

## D120

```{r}
seurat_idx <- 1

seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]@active.ident <- factor(
  seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$genotype, c("WT", "HET", "HOM")
)
```

### All Cells

```{r}
sce <- SingleCellExperiment(list(counts = GetAssayData(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], slot = "counts")))
sce$sample <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$sample
sce$genotype <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(logcounts(sce), design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", method = "global", F.adjust = "BH"
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
results <- results[ , -1]
results <- results[order(results$F.p.value), ]

write.csv(
  results,
  file.path(
    results_dir,
    "comb",
    "04-DEGs",
    paste(sub_name, names(seurat_list[seurat_idx]), "AllCells", "AllStats", "DEGs.csv", sep = "-")
  )
)
datatable_download_exp(results)
```

#### WT < HET < HOM

```{r}
tests_up <- tests[tests[ , 1] == -1 & tests[ , 2] == 1 & tests[ , 3] == 1, ]
up <- results[rownames(results) %in% rownames(tests_up), ]

write.csv(
  up,
  file.path(
    results_dir,
    "comb",
    "04-DEGs",
    paste(sub_name, names(seurat_list[seurat_idx]), "AllCells", "WT<HET<HOM", "DEGs.csv", sep = "-")
  )
)
datatable_download_exp(up)

if (nrow(up) > 25) {
  mat <- logcounts(sce)[which(rownames(sce) %in% rownames(up)[1:25]), ]
  mat <- t(apply(mat, 1, function (x) ((2 * (x - min(x)) / (max(x) - min(x))) - 1)))
  set.seed(1)
  draw(
    Heatmap(
      mat,
      column_order = c(5, 6, 1, 2, 3, 4),
      column_names_rot = 45,
      heatmap_legend_param = list(
        title = "Per-row Scaled Pseudobulk Expression", direction = "horizontal",
        legend_width = unit(7.5, "cm")
      )
    ),
    heatmap_legend_side = "top"
  )
} else if (nrow(up) > 1) {
  mat <- logcounts(sce)[which(rownames(sce) %in% rownames(up)), ]  
  mat <- t(apply(mat, 1, function (x) ((2 * (x - min(x)) / (max(x) - min(x))) - 1)))
  set.seed(1)
  draw(
    Heatmap(
      mat,
      column_order = c(5, 6, 1, 2, 3, 4),
      column_names_rot = 45,
      heatmap_legend_param = list(
        title = "Per-row Scaled Pseudobulk Expression", direction = "horizontal",
        legend_width = unit(7.5, "cm")
      )
    ),
    heatmap_legend_side = "top"
  )
}

if (nrow(up) > 12) {
  VlnPlot(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], rownames(up)[1:12])
} else if (nrow(up) > 0) {
  VlnPlot(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], rownames(up)[seq(nrow(up))])
}
```

#### Radial and 3D Volcano Plots

```{r}
DEGs <- c(HET, HOM, WT, HET_plus_HOM, HOM_plus_WT, WT_plus_HET)

design <- data.frame(genotype = sce$genotype)
rownames(design) <- colnames(sce)
results <- results[match(rownames(sce), rownames(results)), ]

p_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.HET...HOM = results$P.value.HET...HOM,
    P.value.HET...WT = results$P.value.HET...WT,
    P.value.HOM...WT = results$P.value.HOM...WT
  )
)
p_adj_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.adj.HET...HOM = results$P.value.adj.HET...HOM,
    P.value.adj.HET...WT = results$P.value.adj.HET...WT,
    P.value.adj.HOM...WT = results$P.value.adj.HOM...WT
  )
)

polar <- polar_coords(
  design$genotype, t(logcounts(sce)), p_mat, p_adj_mat, labs = unique(design$genotype)
)

if (any(is.na(DEGs))) {
  radial_ggplot(polar, 2, colour_code_labels = TRUE, marker_size = 2)
} else {
  radial_ggplot(polar, 2, label_rows = DEGs, colour_code_labels = TRUE, marker_size = 2)
}
```

### Upper Layer

```{r}
sub_seurat <- subset(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], clustermap_names_short == "Ex Upper Layer")

sce <- SingleCellExperiment(list(counts = GetAssayData(sub_seurat, slot = "counts")))
sce$sample <- sub_seurat$sample
sce$genotype <- sub_seurat$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- sub_seurat$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(logcounts(sce), design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", method = "global", F.adjust = "BH"
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
results <- results[ , -1]
results <- results[order(results$F.p.value), ]

write.csv(
  results,
  file.path(
    results_dir,
    "comb",
    "04-DEGs",
    paste(sub_name, names(seurat_list[seurat_idx]), "UpperLayer", "DEGs.csv", sep = "-")
  )
)
datatable_download_exp(results)
```

### Upper Layer 07

```{r}
sub_seurat <- subset(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], clustermap_names == "Ex Upper Layer 07")

sce <- SingleCellExperiment(list(counts = GetAssayData(sub_seurat, slot = "counts")))
sce$sample <- sub_seurat$sample
sce$genotype <- sub_seurat$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- sub_seurat$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(logcounts(sce), design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", method = "global", F.adjust = "BH"
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
results <- results[ , -1]
results <- results[order(results$F.p.value), ]

write.csv(
  results,
  file.path(
    results_dir,
    "comb",
    "04-DEGs",
    paste(sub_name, names(seurat_list[seurat_idx]), "UpperLayer07", "DEGs.csv", sep = "-")
  )
)
datatable_download_exp(results)
```

```{r}
DEGs <- c(HET, HOM, WT, HET_plus_HOM, HOM_plus_WT, WT_plus_HET)

design <- data.frame(genotype = sce$genotype)
rownames(design) <- colnames(sce)
results <- results[match(rownames(sce), rownames(results)), ]

p_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.HET...HOM = results$P.value.HET...HOM,
    P.value.HET...WT = results$P.value.HET...WT,
    P.value.HOM...WT = results$P.value.HOM...WT
  )
)
p_adj_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.adj.HET...HOM = results$P.value.adj.HET...HOM,
    P.value.adj.HET...WT = results$P.value.adj.HET...WT,
    P.value.adj.HOM...WT = results$P.value.adj.HOM...WT
  )
)

polar <- polar_coords(
  design$genotype, t(logcounts(sce)), p_mat, p_adj_mat, labs = unique(design$genotype)
)
```

### Upper Layer 03

```{r}
sub_seurat <- subset(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], clustermap_names == "Ex Upper Layer 03")

sce <- SingleCellExperiment(list(counts = GetAssayData(sub_seurat, slot = "counts")))
sce$sample <- sub_seurat$sample
sce$genotype <- sub_seurat$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- sub_seurat$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(logcounts(sce), design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", method = "global", F.adjust = "BH"
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
results <- results[ , -1]
results <- results[order(results$F.p.value), ]

write.csv(
  results,
  file.path(
    results_dir,
    "comb",
    "04-DEGs",
    paste(sub_name, names(seurat_list[seurat_idx]), "UpperLayer03", "DEGs.csv", sep = "-")
  )
)
datatable_download_exp(results)
```

```{r}
  data.frame(

  )
)

  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.adj.HET...HOM = results$P.value.adj.HET...HOM,
    P.value.adj.HET...WT = results$P.value.adj.HET...WT,
    P.value.adj.HOM...WT = results$P.value.adj.HOM...WT
  )
)
```

### Deep Layer

```{r}
sub_seurat <- subset(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], clustermap_names_short == "Ex Deep Layer")

sce <- SingleCellExperiment(list(counts = GetAssayData(sub_seurat, slot = "counts")))
sce$sample <- sub_seurat$sample
sce$genotype <- sub_seurat$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- sub_seurat$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(logcounts(sce), design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", method = "global", F.adjust = "BH"
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
results <- results[ , -1]
results <- results[order(results$F.p.value), ]

write.csv(
  results,
  file.path(
    results_dir,
    "comb",
    "04-DEGs",
    paste(sub_name, names(seurat_list[seurat_idx]), "DeepLayer", "DEGs.csv", sep = "-")
  )
)
datatable_download_exp(results)
```

```{r}
DEGs <- c(HET, HOM, WT, HET_plus_HOM, HOM_plus_WT, WT_plus_HET)

design <- data.frame(genotype = sce$genotype)
rownames(design) <- colnames(sce)
results <- results[match(rownames(sce), rownames(results)), ]

p_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.HET...HOM = results$P.value.HET...HOM,
    P.value.HET...WT = results$P.value.HET...WT,
    P.value.HOM...WT = results$P.value.HOM...WT
  )
)
p_adj_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.adj.HET...HOM = results$P.value.adj.HET...HOM,
    P.value.adj.HET...WT = results$P.value.adj.HET...WT,
    P.value.adj.HOM...WT = results$P.value.adj.HOM...WT
  )
)

polar <- polar_coords(
  design$genotype, t(logcounts(sce)), p_mat, p_adj_mat, labs = unique(design$genotype)
)

if (any(is.na(DEGs))) {
  radial_ggplot(polar, 2, colour_code_labels = TRUE, marker_size = 2)
} else {
  radial_ggplot(polar, 2, label_rows = DEGs, colour_code_labels = TRUE, marker_size = 2)
}
```

### Deep Layer 01

```{r}
sub_seurat <- subset(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], clustermap_names == "Ex Deep Layer 01")

sce <- SingleCellExperiment(list(counts = GetAssayData(sub_seurat, slot = "counts")))
sce$sample <- sub_seurat$sample
sce$genotype <- sub_seurat$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- sub_seurat$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(logcounts(sce), design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", method = "global", F.adjust = "BH"
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
results <- results[ , -1]
results <- results[order(results$F.p.value), ]

write.csv(
  results,
  file.path(
    results_dir,
    "comb",
    "04-DEGs",
    paste(sub_name, names(seurat_list[seurat_idx]), "DeepLayer01", "DEGs.csv", sep = "-")
  )
)
datatable_download_exp(results)
```

```{r}
  data.frame(

  )
)

  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.adj.HET...HOM = results$P.value.adj.HET...HOM,
    P.value.adj.HET...WT = results$P.value.adj.HET...WT,

  )
)

)
```

## D72

```{r}
seurat_idx <- 2

seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]@active.ident <- factor(
  seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$genotype, c("WT", "HET", "HOM")
)
```

### All Cells

```{r}
sce <- SingleCellExperiment(list(counts = GetAssayData(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], slot = "counts")))
sce$sample <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$sample
sce$genotype <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(logcounts(sce), design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", method = "global", F.adjust = "BH"
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
results <- results[ , -1]
results <- results[order(results$F.p.value), ]

write.csv(
  results,
  file.path(
    results_dir,
    "comb",
    "04-DEGs",
    paste(sub_name, names(seurat_list[seurat_idx]), "AllCells", "AllStats", "DEGs.csv", sep = "-")
  )
)
datatable_download_exp(results)
```

#### Radial and 3D Volcano Plots

```{r}
DEGs <- c(HET, HOM, WT, HET_plus_HOM, HOM_plus_WT, WT_plus_HET)

design <- data.frame(genotype = sce$genotype)
rownames(design) <- colnames(sce)
results <- results[match(rownames(sce), rownames(results)), ]

p_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.HET...HOM = results$P.value.HET...HOM,
    P.value.HET...WT = results$P.value.HET...WT,
    P.value.HOM...WT = results$P.value.HOM...WT
  )
)
p_adj_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.adj.HET...HOM = results$P.value.adj.HET...HOM,
    P.value.adj.HET...WT = results$P.value.adj.HET...WT,
    P.value.adj.HOM...WT = results$P.value.adj.HOM...WT
  )
)

polar <- polar_coords(
  design$genotype, t(logcounts(sce)), p_mat, p_adj_mat, labs = unique(design$genotype)
)

if (any(is.na(DEGs))) {
  radial_ggplot(polar, 2, colour_code_labels = TRUE, marker_size = 2)
} else {
  radial_ggplot(polar, 2, label_rows = DEGs, colour_code_labels = TRUE, marker_size = 2)
}
```

### Upper Layer

```{r}
sub_seurat <- subset(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], clustermap_names_short == "Ex Upper Layer")

sce <- SingleCellExperiment(list(counts = GetAssayData(sub_seurat, slot = "counts")))
sce$sample <- sub_seurat$sample
sce$genotype <- sub_seurat$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- sub_seurat$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(logcounts(sce), design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", method = "global", F.adjust = "BH"
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
results <- results[ , -1]
results <- results[order(results$F.p.value), ]

write.csv(
  results,
  file.path(
    results_dir,
    "comb",
    "04-DEGs",
    paste(sub_name, names(seurat_list[seurat_idx]), "UpperLayer", "DEGs.csv", sep = "-")
  )
)
datatable_download_exp(results)
```

```{r}
  data.frame(

  )
)

  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.adj.HET...HOM = results$P.value.adj.HET...HOM,
    P.value.adj.HET...WT = results$P.value.adj.HET...WT,
    P.value.adj.HOM...WT = results$P.value.adj.HOM...WT
  )
)
```

### Upper Layer 07

```{r}
sub_seurat <- subset(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], clustermap_names == "Ex Upper Layer 07")

sce <- SingleCellExperiment(list(counts = GetAssayData(sub_seurat, slot = "counts")))
sce$sample <- sub_seurat$sample
sce$genotype <- sub_seurat$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- sub_seurat$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(logcounts(sce), design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", method = "global", F.adjust = "BH"
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
results <- results[ , -1]
results <- results[order(results$F.p.value), ]

write.csv(
  results,
  file.path(
    results_dir,
    "comb",
    "04-DEGs",
    paste(sub_name, names(seurat_list[seurat_idx]), "UpperLayer07", "DEGs.csv", sep = "-")
  )
)
datatable_download_exp(results)
```

#### Radial and 3D Volcano Plots

```{r}
DEGs <- c(HET, HOM, WT, HET_plus_HOM, HOM_plus_WT, WT_plus_HET)

design <- data.frame(genotype = sce$genotype)
rownames(design) <- colnames(sce)
results <- results[match(rownames(sce), rownames(results)), ]

p_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.HET...HOM = results$P.value.HET...HOM,
    P.value.HET...WT = results$P.value.HET...WT,
    P.value.HOM...WT = results$P.value.HOM...WT
  )
)
p_adj_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.adj.HET...HOM = results$P.value.adj.HET...HOM,
    P.value.adj.HET...WT = results$P.value.adj.HET...WT,
    P.value.adj.HOM...WT = results$P.value.adj.HOM...WT
  )
)

polar <- polar_coords(
  design$genotype, t(logcounts(sce)), p_mat, p_adj_mat, labs = unique(design$genotype)
)

if (any(is.na(DEGs))) {
  radial_ggplot(polar, 2, colour_code_labels = TRUE, marker_size = 2)
} else {
  radial_ggplot(polar, 2, label_rows = DEGs, colour_code_labels = TRUE, marker_size = 2)
}
```


### Deep Layer

```{r}
sub_seurat <- subset(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], clustermap_names_short == "Ex Deep Layer")

sce <- SingleCellExperiment(list(counts = GetAssayData(sub_seurat, slot = "counts")))
sce$sample <- sub_seurat$sample
sce$genotype <- sub_seurat$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- sub_seurat$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(logcounts(sce), design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", method = "global", F.adjust = "BH"
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
results <- results[ , -1]
results <- results[order(results$F.p.value), ]

write.csv(
  results,
  file.path(
    results_dir,
    "comb",
    "04-DEGs",
    paste(sub_name, names(seurat_list[seurat_idx]), "DeepLayer", "DEGs.csv", sep = "-")
  )
)
datatable_download_exp(results)
```

```{r}
DEGs <- c(HET, HOM, WT, HET_plus_HOM, HOM_plus_WT, WT_plus_HET)

p_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.HET...HOM = results$P.value.HET...HOM,
    P.value.HET...WT = results$P.value.HET...WT,
    P.value.HOM...WT = results$P.value.HOM...WT
  )
)
p_adj_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.adj.HET...HOM = results$P.value.adj.HET...HOM,
    P.value.adj.HET...WT = results$P.value.adj.HET...WT,
    P.value.adj.HOM...WT = results$P.value.adj.HOM...WT
  )
)

polar <- polar_coords(
  design$genotype, t(logcounts(sce)), p_mat, p_adj_mat, labs = unique(design$genotype)
)
```

### Newborn

```{r}
sub_seurat <- subset(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], clustermap_names_short == "Ex Newborn")

sce <- SingleCellExperiment(list(counts = GetAssayData(sub_seurat, slot = "counts")))
sce$sample <- sub_seurat$sample
sce$genotype <- sub_seurat$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- sub_seurat$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(logcounts(sce), design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", method = "global", F.adjust = "BH"
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
results <- results[ , -1]
results <- results[order(results$F.p.value), ]

write.csv(
  results,
  file.path(
    results_dir,
    "comb",
    "04-DEGs",
    paste(sub_name, names(seurat_list[seurat_idx]), "Newborn", "DEGs.csv", sep = "-")
  )
)
datatable_download_exp(results)
```

```{r}
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.HET...HOM = results$P.value.HET...HOM,
    P.value.HET...WT = results$P.value.HET...WT,
    P.value.HOM...WT = results$P.value.HOM...WT
  )
)
p_adj_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.adj.HET...HOM = results$P.value.adj.HET...HOM,
    P.value.adj.HET...WT = results$P.value.adj.HET...WT,
    P.value.adj.HOM...WT = results$P.value.adj.HOM...WT
  )
)

polar <- polar_coords(
  design$genotype, t(logcounts(sce)), p_mat, p_adj_mat, labs = unique(design$genotype)
)

if (any(is.na(DEGs))) {
  radial_ggplot(polar, 2, colour_code_labels = TRUE, marker_size = 2)
} else {
  radial_ggplot(polar, 2, label_rows = DEGs, colour_code_labels = TRUE, marker_size = 2)
}
```

# Radial Glia

```{r}
sub_name <- "RG"
seurat_list <- readRDS(
  file.path(cache_dir, "..", "03", paste(sub_name, "seurat_list.rds", sep = "_"))
)
```

## D120

```{r}
seurat_idx <- 1

seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]@active.ident <- factor(
  seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$genotype, c("WT", "HET", "HOM")
)
```

### All Cells

```{r}
sce <- SingleCellExperiment(list(counts = GetAssayData(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], slot = "counts")))
sce$sample <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$sample
sce$genotype <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(logcounts(sce), design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", method = "global", F.adjust = "BH"
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
results <- results[ , -1]
results <- results[order(results$F.p.value), ]

write.csv(
  results,
  file.path(
    results_dir,
    "comb",
    "04-DEGs",
    paste(sub_name, names(seurat_list[seurat_idx]), "AllCells", "AllStats", "DEGs.csv", sep = "-")
  )
)
datatable_download_exp(results)
```

```{r}
DEGs <- c(HET, HOM, WT, HET_plus_HOM, HOM_plus_WT, WT_plus_HET)

design <- data.frame(genotype = sce$genotype)
rownames(design) <- colnames(sce)
results <- results[match(rownames(sce), rownames(results)), ]

p_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.HET...HOM = results$P.value.HET...HOM,
    P.value.HET...WT = results$P.value.HET...WT,
    P.value.HOM...WT = results$P.value.HOM...WT
  )
)
p_adj_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.adj.HET...HOM = results$P.value.adj.HET...HOM,
    P.value.adj.HET...WT = results$P.value.adj.HET...WT,
    P.value.adj.HOM...WT = results$P.value.adj.HOM...WT
  )
)

polar <- polar_coords(
  design$genotype, t(logcounts(sce)), p_mat, p_adj_mat, labs = unique(design$genotype)
)

if (any(is.na(DEGs))) {
  radial_ggplot(polar, 2, colour_code_labels = TRUE, marker_size = 2)
} else {
  radial_ggplot(polar, 2, label_rows = DEGs, colour_code_labels = TRUE, marker_size = 2)
}
```

### Astrocyte

```{r}
sub_seurat <- subset(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], clustermap_names_short == "RG Astrocyte")

sce <- SingleCellExperiment(list(counts = GetAssayData(sub_seurat, slot = "counts")))
sce$sample <- sub_seurat$sample
sce$genotype <- sub_seurat$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- sub_seurat$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(logcounts(sce), design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", method = "global", F.adjust = "BH"
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
results <- results[ , -1]
results <- results[order(results$F.p.value), ]

write.csv(
  results,
  file.path(
    results_dir,
    "comb",
    "04-DEGs",
    paste(sub_name, names(seurat_list[seurat_idx]), "Astrocyte", "DEGs.csv", sep = "-")
  )
)
datatable_download_exp(results)
```

### Astrocyte 01, 02, 03, 04

```{r}
sub_seurat <- subset(
  seurat_list[[seurat_idx]],
  clustermap_names == "RG Astrocyte 01" | clustermap_names == "RG Astrocyte 02" |
    clustermap_names == "RG Astrocyte 03" | clustermap_names == "RG Astrocyte 04"
)

sce <- SingleCellExperiment(list(counts = GetAssayData(sub_seurat, slot = "counts")))
sce$sample <- sub_seurat$sample
sce$genotype <- sub_seurat$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- sub_seurat$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(logcounts(sce), design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", method = "global", F.adjust = "BH"
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
results <- results[ , -1]
results <- results[order(results$F.p.value), ]

write.csv(
  results,
  file.path(
    results_dir,
    "comb",
    "04-DEGs",
    paste(sub_name, names(seurat_list[seurat_idx]), "Astrocyte01020304", "DEGs.csv", sep = "-")
  )
)
datatable_download_exp(results)
```

```{r}
DEGs <- c(HET, HOM, WT, HET_plus_HOM, HOM_plus_WT, WT_plus_HET)

design <- data.frame(genotype = sce$genotype)
rownames(design) <- colnames(sce)
results <- results[match(rownames(sce), rownames(results)), ]

p_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.HET...HOM = results$P.value.HET...HOM,
    P.value.HET...WT = results$P.value.HET...WT,
    P.value.HOM...WT = results$P.value.HOM...WT
  )
)
p_adj_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.adj.HET...HOM = results$P.value.adj.HET...HOM,
    P.value.adj.HET...WT = results$P.value.adj.HET...WT,
    P.value.adj.HOM...WT = results$P.value.adj.HOM...WT
  )
)

polar <- polar_coords(
  design$genotype, t(logcounts(sce)), p_mat, p_adj_mat, labs = unique(design$genotype)
)

if (any(is.na(DEGs))) {
  radial_ggplot(polar, 2, colour_code_labels = TRUE, marker_size = 2)
} else {
  radial_ggplot(polar, 2, label_rows = DEGs, colour_code_labels = TRUE, marker_size = 2)
}
```

### Astrocyte 05, 06, 07, 08

```{r}
sub_seurat <- subset(
  seurat_list[[seurat_idx]],
  clustermap_names == "RG Astrocyte 05" | clustermap_names == "RG Astrocyte 06" |
    clustermap_names == "RG Astrocyte 07" | clustermap_names == "RG Astrocyte 08"
)

sce <- SingleCellExperiment(list(counts = GetAssayData(sub_seurat, slot = "counts")))
sce$sample <- sub_seurat$sample
sce$genotype <- sub_seurat$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- sub_seurat$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(logcounts(sce), design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", method = "global", F.adjust = "BH"
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
results <- results[ , -1]
results <- results[order(results$F.p.value), ]

write.csv(
  results,
  file.path(
    results_dir,
    "comb",
    "04-DEGs",
    paste(sub_name, names(seurat_list[seurat_idx]), "Astrocyte05060708", "DEGs.csv", sep = "-")
  )
)
datatable_download_exp(results)
```

### Early

```{r}
sub_seurat <- subset(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], clustermap_names_short == "RG Early")

sce <- SingleCellExperiment(list(counts = GetAssayData(sub_seurat, slot = "counts")))
sce$sample <- sub_seurat$sample
sce$genotype <- sub_seurat$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- sub_seurat$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(logcounts(sce), design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", method = "global", F.adjust = "BH"
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
results <- results[ , -1]
results <- results[order(results$F.p.value), ]

write.csv(
  results,
  file.path(
    results_dir,
    "comb",
    "04-DEGs",
    paste(sub_name, names(seurat_list[seurat_idx]), "Early", "DEGs.csv", sep = "-")
  )
)
datatable_download_exp(results)
```

```{r}
DEGs <- c(HET, HOM, WT, HET_plus_HOM, HOM_plus_WT, WT_plus_HET)

design <- data.frame(genotype = sce$genotype)
rownames(design) <- colnames(sce)
results <- results[match(rownames(sce), rownames(results)), ]

p_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.HET...HOM = results$P.value.HET...HOM,
    P.value.HET...WT = results$P.value.HET...WT,
    P.value.HOM...WT = results$P.value.HOM...WT
  )
)
p_adj_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.adj.HET...HOM = results$P.value.adj.HET...HOM,
    P.value.adj.HET...WT = results$P.value.adj.HET...WT,
    P.value.adj.HOM...WT = results$P.value.adj.HOM...WT
  )
)

polar <- polar_coords(
  design$genotype, t(logcounts(sce)), p_mat, p_adj_mat, labs = unique(design$genotype)
)

if (any(is.na(DEGs))) {
  radial_ggplot(polar, 2, colour_code_labels = TRUE, marker_size = 2)
} else {
  radial_ggplot(polar, 2, label_rows = DEGs, colour_code_labels = TRUE, marker_size = 2)
}
```

### Late

```{r}
sub_seurat <- subset(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], clustermap_names_short == "RG Late")

sce <- SingleCellExperiment(list(counts = GetAssayData(sub_seurat, slot = "counts")))
sce$sample <- sub_seurat$sample
sce$genotype <- sub_seurat$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- sub_seurat$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(logcounts(sce), design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", method = "global", F.adjust = "BH"
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
results <- results[ , -1]
results <- results[order(results$F.p.value), ]

write.csv(
  results,
  file.path(
    results_dir,
    "comb",
    "04-DEGs",
    paste(sub_name, names(seurat_list[seurat_idx]), "Late", "DEGs.csv", sep = "-")
  )
)
datatable_download_exp(results)
```

## D72

```{r}
seurat_idx <- 2

seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]@active.ident <- factor(
  seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$genotype, c("WT", "HET", "HOM")
)
```

### All Cells

```{r}
sce <- SingleCellExperiment(list(counts = GetAssayData(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], slot = "counts")))
sce$sample <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$sample
sce$genotype <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(logcounts(sce), design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", method = "global", F.adjust = "BH"
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
results <- results[ , -1]
results <- results[order(results$F.p.value), ]

write.csv(
  results,
  file.path(
    results_dir,
    "comb",
    "04-DEGs",
    paste(sub_name, names(seurat_list[seurat_idx]), "AllCells", "AllStats", "DEGs.csv", sep = "-")
  )
)
datatable_download_exp(results)
```

#### Radial and 3D Volcano Plots

```{r}
DEGs <- c(HET, HOM, WT, HET_plus_HOM, HOM_plus_WT, WT_plus_HET)

design <- data.frame(genotype = sce$genotype)
rownames(design) <- colnames(sce)
results <- results[match(rownames(sce), rownames(results)), ]

p_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.HET...HOM = results$P.value.HET...HOM,
    P.value.HET...WT = results$P.value.HET...WT,
    P.value.HOM...WT = results$P.value.HOM...WT
  )
)
p_adj_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.adj.HET...HOM = results$P.value.adj.HET...HOM,
    P.value.adj.HET...WT = results$P.value.adj.HET...WT,
    P.value.adj.HOM...WT = results$P.value.adj.HOM...WT
  )
)

polar <- polar_coords(
  design$genotype, t(logcounts(sce)), p_mat, p_adj_mat, labs = unique(design$genotype)
)

if (any(is.na(DEGs))) {
  radial_ggplot(polar, 2, colour_code_labels = TRUE, marker_size = 2)
} else {
  radial_ggplot(polar, 2, label_rows = DEGs, colour_code_labels = TRUE, marker_size = 2)
}
```

### Astrocyte

```{r}
sub_seurat <- subset(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], clustermap_names_short == "RG Astrocyte")

sce <- SingleCellExperiment(list(counts = GetAssayData(sub_seurat, slot = "counts")))
sce$sample <- sub_seurat$sample
sce$genotype <- sub_seurat$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- sub_seurat$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(logcounts(sce), design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", method = "global", F.adjust = "BH"
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
results <- results[ , -1]
results <- results[order(results$F.p.value), ]

write.csv(
  results,
  file.path(
    results_dir,
    "comb",
    "04-DEGs",
    paste(sub_name, names(seurat_list[seurat_idx]), "Astrocyte", "DEGs.csv", sep = "-")
  )
)
datatable_download_exp(results)
```

```{r}
DEGs <- c(HET, HOM, WT, HET_plus_HOM, HOM_plus_WT, WT_plus_HET)

p_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.HET...HOM = results$P.value.HET...HOM,
    P.value.HET...WT = results$P.value.HET...WT,
    P.value.HOM...WT = results$P.value.HOM...WT
  )
)
p_adj_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.adj.HET...HOM = results$P.value.adj.HET...HOM,
    P.value.adj.HET...WT = results$P.value.adj.HET...WT,
    P.value.adj.HOM...WT = results$P.value.adj.HOM...WT
  )
)

polar <- polar_coords(
  design$genotype, t(logcounts(sce)), p_mat, p_adj_mat, labs = unique(design$genotype)
```

### Late

```{r}
sub_seurat <- subset(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], clustermap_names_short == "RG Late")

sce <- SingleCellExperiment(list(counts = GetAssayData(sub_seurat, slot = "counts")))
sce$sample <- sub_seurat$sample
sce$genotype <- sub_seurat$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- sub_seurat$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(logcounts(sce), design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", method = "global", F.adjust = "BH"
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
results <- results[ , -1]
results <- results[order(results$F.p.value), ]

write.csv(
  results,
  file.path(
    results_dir,
    "comb",
    "04-DEGs",
    paste(sub_name, names(seurat_list[seurat_idx]), "Late", "DEGs.csv", sep = "-")
  )
)
datatable_download_exp(results)
```

#### Radial and 3D Volcano Plots

```{r}
DEGs <- c(HET, HOM, WT, HET_plus_HOM, HOM_plus_WT, WT_plus_HET)

design <- data.frame(genotype = sce$genotype)
rownames(design) <- colnames(sce)
results <- results[match(rownames(sce), rownames(results)), ]

p_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.HET...HOM = results$P.value.HET...HOM,
    P.value.HET...WT = results$P.value.HET...WT,
    P.value.HOM...WT = results$P.value.HOM...WT
  )
)
p_adj_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.adj.HET...HOM = results$P.value.adj.HET...HOM,
    P.value.adj.HET...WT = results$P.value.adj.HET...WT,
    P.value.adj.HOM...WT = results$P.value.adj.HOM...WT
  )
)

polar <- polar_coords(
  design$genotype, t(logcounts(sce)), p_mat, p_adj_mat, labs = unique(design$genotype)
)

if (any(is.na(DEGs))) {
  radial_ggplot(polar, 2, colour_code_labels = TRUE, marker_size = 2)
} else {
  radial_ggplot(polar, 2, label_rows = DEGs, colour_code_labels = TRUE, marker_size = 2)
}
```

```{r}
sub_name <- "IPC"
```

## D120

```{r}
seurat_idx <- 1

seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]@active.ident <- factor(
  seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$genotype, c("WT", "HET", "HOM")
)
```

### All Cells

```{r}
sce <- SingleCellExperiment(list(counts = GetAssayData(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], slot = "counts")))
sce$sample <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$sample
sce$genotype <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(logcounts(sce), design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", method = "global", F.adjust = "BH"
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
results <- results[ , -1]
results <- results[order(results$F.p.value), ]

write.csv(
  results,
  file.path(
    results_dir,
    "comb",
    "04-DEGs",
    paste(sub_name, names(seurat_list[seurat_idx]), "AllCells", "AllStats", "DEGs.csv", sep = "-")
  )
)
datatable_download_exp(results)
```

```{r}
DEGs <- c(HET, HOM, WT, HET_plus_HOM, HOM_plus_WT, WT_plus_HET)

design <- data.frame(genotype = sce$genotype)

p_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.HET...HOM = results$P.value.HET...HOM,
    P.value.HET...WT = results$P.value.HET...WT,
    P.value.HOM...WT = results$P.value.HOM...WT
  )
)
p_adj_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.adj.HET...HOM = results$P.value.adj.HET...HOM,
    P.value.adj.HET...WT = results$P.value.adj.HET...WT,
    P.value.adj.HOM...WT = results$P.value.adj.HOM...WT
  )
)

polar <- polar_coords(
  design$genotype, t(logcounts(sce)), p_mat, p_adj_mat, labs = unique(design$genotype)
)

}
```

```{r}

  seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$genotype, c("WT", "HET", "HOM")
)
```

### All Cells

```{r}
sce <- SingleCellExperiment(list(counts = GetAssayData(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], slot = "counts")))
sce$sample <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$sample
sce$genotype <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(logcounts(sce), design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", method = "global", F.adjust = "BH"
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
results <- results[ , -1]
results <- results[order(results$F.p.value), ]

write.csv(
  results,
  file.path(
    results_dir,
    "comb",
    "04-DEGs",
    paste(sub_name, names(seurat_list[seurat_idx]), "AllCells", "AllStats", "DEGs.csv", sep = "-")
  )
)
datatable_download_exp(results)
```

#### Radial and 3D Volcano Plots

```{r}
DEGs <- c(HET, HOM, WT, HET_plus_HOM, HOM_plus_WT, WT_plus_HET)

design <- data.frame(genotype = sce$genotype)
rownames(design) <- colnames(sce)
results <- results[match(rownames(sce), rownames(results)), ]

p_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.HET...HOM = results$P.value.HET...HOM,
    P.value.HET...WT = results$P.value.HET...WT,
    P.value.HOM...WT = results$P.value.HOM...WT
  )
)
p_adj_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.adj.HET...HOM = results$P.value.adj.HET...HOM,
    P.value.adj.HET...WT = results$P.value.adj.HET...WT,
    P.value.adj.HOM...WT = results$P.value.adj.HOM...WT
  )
)

polar <- polar_coords(
  design$genotype, t(logcounts(sce)), p_mat, p_adj_mat, labs = unique(design$genotype)
)

if (any(is.na(DEGs))) {
  radial_ggplot(polar, 2, colour_code_labels = TRUE, marker_size = 2)
} else {
  radial_ggplot(polar, 2, label_rows = DEGs, colour_code_labels = TRUE, marker_size = 2)
}
```

# Inhibitory Neuron

```{r}
sub_name <- "In"
seurat_list <- readRDS(
  file.path(cache_dir, "..", "03", paste(sub_name, "seurat_list.rds", sep = "_"))
)
```

## D120

```{r}
seurat_idx <- 1

seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]@active.ident <- factor(
  seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$genotype, c("WT", "HET", "HOM")
)
```

### All Cells

```{r}
sce <- SingleCellExperiment(list(counts = GetAssayData(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], slot = "counts")))
sce$sample <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$sample
sce$genotype <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(logcounts(sce), design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", method = "global", F.adjust = "BH"
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
results <- results[ , -1]
results <- results[order(results$F.p.value), ]

write.csv(
  results,
  file.path(
    results_dir,
    "comb",
    "04-DEGs",
    paste(sub_name, names(seurat_list[seurat_idx]), "AllCells", "AllStats", "DEGs.csv", sep = "-")
  )
)
datatable_download_exp(results)
```

#### WT < HET < HOM

```{r}
tests_up <- tests[tests[ , 1] == -1 & tests[ , 2] == 1 & tests[ , 3] == 1, ]
up <- results[rownames(results) %in% rownames(tests_up), ]

write.csv(
  up,
  file.path(
    results_dir,
    "comb",
    "04-DEGs",
    paste(sub_name, names(seurat_list[seurat_idx]), "AllCells", "WT<HET<HOM", "DEGs.csv", sep = "-")
  )
)
datatable_download_exp(up)

if (nrow(up) > 25) {
  mat <- logcounts(sce)[which(rownames(sce) %in% rownames(up)[1:25]), ]
  mat <- t(apply(mat, 1, function (x) ((2 * (x - min(x)) / (max(x) - min(x))) - 1)))
  set.seed(1)
  draw(
    Heatmap(
      mat,
      column_order = c(5, 6, 1, 2, 3, 4),
      column_names_rot = 45,
      heatmap_legend_param = list(
        title = "Per-row Scaled Pseudobulk Expression", direction = "horizontal",
        legend_width = unit(7.5, "cm")
      )
    ),
    heatmap_legend_side = "top"
  )
} else if (nrow(up) > 1) {
  mat <- logcounts(sce)[which(rownames(sce) %in% rownames(up)), ]  
  mat <- t(apply(mat, 1, function (x) ((2 * (x - min(x)) / (max(x) - min(x))) - 1)))
  set.seed(1)
  draw(
    Heatmap(
      mat,
      column_order = c(5, 6, 1, 2, 3, 4),
      column_names_rot = 45,
      heatmap_legend_param = list(
        title = "Per-row Scaled Pseudobulk Expression", direction = "horizontal",
        legend_width = unit(7.5, "cm")
      )
    ),
    heatmap_legend_side = "top"
  )
}

if (nrow(up) > 12) {
  VlnPlot(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], rownames(up)[1:12])
} else if (nrow(up) > 0) {
  VlnPlot(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], rownames(up)[seq(nrow(up))])
}
```

```{r}
DEGs <- c(HET, HOM, WT, HET_plus_HOM, HOM_plus_WT, WT_plus_HET)

design <- data.frame(genotype = sce$genotype)
rownames(design) <- colnames(sce)
results <- results[match(rownames(sce), rownames(results)), ]

p_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.HET...HOM = results$P.value.HET...HOM,
    P.value.HET...WT = results$P.value.HET...WT,
    P.value.HOM...WT = results$P.value.HOM...WT
  )
)
p_adj_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.adj.HET...HOM = results$P.value.adj.HET...HOM,
    P.value.adj.HET...WT = results$P.value.adj.HET...WT,
    P.value.adj.HOM...WT = results$P.value.adj.HOM...WT
  )
)

polar <- polar_coords(
  design$genotype, t(logcounts(sce)), p_mat, p_adj_mat, labs = unique(design$genotype)
)

if (any(is.na(DEGs))) {
  radial_ggplot(polar, 2, colour_code_labels = TRUE, marker_size = 2)
} else {
  radial_ggplot(polar, 2, label_rows = DEGs, colour_code_labels = TRUE, marker_size = 2)
}
```

### No Unclassified

```{r}
sub_seurat <- subset(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], clustermap_names_short == "In")

sce <- SingleCellExperiment(list(counts = GetAssayData(sub_seurat, slot = "counts")))
sce$sample <- sub_seurat$sample
sce$genotype <- sub_seurat$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- sub_seurat$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(logcounts(sce), design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", method = "global", F.adjust = "BH"
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
results <- results[ , -1]
results <- results[order(results$F.p.value), ]

write.csv(
  results,
  file.path(
    results_dir,
    "comb",
    "04-DEGs",
    paste(sub_name, names(seurat_list[seurat_idx]), "In", "DEGs.csv", sep = "-")
  )
)
datatable_download_exp(results)
```

## D72

```{r}
seurat_idx <- 2

seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]@active.ident <- factor(
  seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$genotype, c("WT", "HET", "HOM")
)
```

### All Cells

```{r}
sce <- SingleCellExperiment(list(counts = GetAssayData(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], slot = "counts")))
sce$sample <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$sample
sce$genotype <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(logcounts(sce), design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", method = "global", F.adjust = "BH"
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
results <- results[ , -1]
results <- results[order(results$F.p.value), ]

write.csv(
  results,
  file.path(
    results_dir,
    "comb",
    "04-DEGs",
    paste(sub_name, names(seurat_list[seurat_idx]), "AllCells", "AllStats", "DEGs.csv", sep = "-")
  )
)
datatable_download_exp(results)
```

```{r}
DEGs <- c(HET, HOM, WT, HET_plus_HOM, HOM_plus_WT, WT_plus_HET)

design <- data.frame(genotype = sce$genotype)
rownames(design) <- colnames(sce)
results <- results[match(rownames(sce), rownames(results)), ]

p_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.HET...HOM = results$P.value.HET...HOM,
    P.value.HET...WT = results$P.value.HET...WT,
    P.value.HOM...WT = results$P.value.HOM...WT
  )
)
p_adj_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.adj.HET...HOM = results$P.value.adj.HET...HOM,
    P.value.adj.HET...WT = results$P.value.adj.HET...WT,
    P.value.adj.HOM...WT = results$P.value.adj.HOM...WT
  )
)

polar <- polar_coords(
  design$genotype, t(logcounts(sce)), p_mat, p_adj_mat, labs = unique(design$genotype)
)

if (any(is.na(DEGs))) {
  radial_ggplot(polar, 2, colour_code_labels = TRUE, marker_size = 2)

}
```

### No Unclassified

```{r}
sub_seurat <- subset(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], clustermap_names_short == "In")

sce <- SingleCellExperiment(list(counts = GetAssayData(sub_seurat, slot = "counts")))
sce$sample <- sub_seurat$sample
sce$genotype <- sub_seurat$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- sub_seurat$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(logcounts(sce), design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", method = "global", F.adjust = "BH"
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
results <- results[ , -1]
results <- results[order(results$F.p.value), ]

write.csv(
  results,
  file.path(
    results_dir,
    "comb",
    "04-DEGs",
    paste(sub_name, names(seurat_list[seurat_idx]), "In", "DEGs.csv", sep = "-")
  )
)
datatable_download_exp(results)
```

## D120

```{r}
seurat_idx <- 1

seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]@active.ident <- factor(
  seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$genotype, c("WT", "HET", "HOM")
)
```

### All Cells

```{r}
sce <- SingleCellExperiment(list(counts = GetAssayData(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], slot = "counts")))
sce$sample <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$sample
sce$genotype <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(logcounts(sce), design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", method = "global", F.adjust = "BH"
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
results <- results[ , -1]
results <- results[order(results$F.p.value), ]

write.csv(
  results,
  file.path(
    results_dir,
    "comb",
    "04-DEGs",
    paste(sub_name, names(seurat_list[seurat_idx]), "AllCells", "AllStats", "DEGs.csv", sep = "-")
  )
)
datatable_download_exp(results)
```

```{r}
DEGs <- c(HET, HOM, WT, HET_plus_HOM, HOM_plus_WT, WT_plus_HET)

design <- data.frame(genotype = sce$genotype)
rownames(design) <- colnames(sce)
results <- results[match(rownames(sce), rownames(results)), ]

p_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.HET...HOM = results$P.value.HET...HOM,
    P.value.HET...WT = results$P.value.HET...WT,
    P.value.HOM...WT = results$P.value.HOM...WT
  )
)
p_adj_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.adj.HET...HOM = results$P.value.adj.HET...HOM,
    P.value.adj.HET...WT = results$P.value.adj.HET...WT,
    P.value.adj.HOM...WT = results$P.value.adj.HOM...WT
  )
)

polar <- polar_coords(
  design$genotype, t(logcounts(sce)), p_mat, p_adj_mat, labs = unique(design$genotype)
)

if (any(is.na(DEGs))) {
  radial_ggplot(polar, 2, colour_code_labels = TRUE, marker_size = 2)
} else {
  radial_ggplot(polar, 2, label_rows = DEGs, colour_code_labels = TRUE, marker_size = 2)
}
```

## D72

```{r}
seurat_idx <- 2

seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]@active.ident <- factor(
  seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$genotype, c("WT", "HET", "HOM")
)
```

### All Cells

```{r}
sce <- SingleCellExperiment(list(counts = GetAssayData(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], slot = "counts")))
sce$sample <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$sample
sce$genotype <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(logcounts(sce), design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", method = "global", F.adjust = "BH"
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
results <- results[ , -1]
results <- results[order(results$F.p.value), ]

write.csv(
  results,
  file.path(
    results_dir,
    "comb",
    "04-DEGs",
    paste(sub_name, names(seurat_list[seurat_idx]), "AllCells", "AllStats", "DEGs.csv", sep = "-")
  )
)
datatable_download_exp(results)
```

```{r}
DEGs <- c(HET, HOM, WT, HET_plus_HOM, HOM_plus_WT, WT_plus_HET)

design <- data.frame(genotype = sce$genotype)

p_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.HET...HOM = results$P.value.HET...HOM,
    P.value.HET...WT = results$P.value.HET...WT,
    P.value.HOM...WT = results$P.value.HOM...WT
  )
)
p_adj_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.adj.HET...HOM = results$P.value.adj.HET...HOM,
    P.value.adj.HET...WT = results$P.value.adj.HET...WT,
    P.value.adj.HOM...WT = results$P.value.adj.HOM...WT
  )
)

polar <- polar_coords(
  design$genotype, t(logcounts(sce)), p_mat, p_adj_mat, labs = unique(design$genotype)
)

if (any(is.na(DEGs))) {
  radial_ggplot(polar, 2, colour_code_labels = TRUE, marker_size = 2)
} else {
  radial_ggplot(polar, 2, label_rows = DEGs, colour_code_labels = TRUE, marker_size = 2)
}
```

## D120

```{r}
seurat_idx <- 1

seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]@active.ident <- factor(
  seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$genotype, c("WT", "HET", "HOM")
)
```

### All Cells

```{r}
sce <- SingleCellExperiment(list(counts = GetAssayData(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], slot = "counts")))
sce$sample <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$sample
sce$genotype <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(logcounts(sce), design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", method = "global", F.adjust = "BH"
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
results <- results[ , -1]
results <- results[order(results$F.p.value), ]

write.csv(
  results,
  file.path(
    results_dir,
    "comb",
    "04-DEGs",
    paste(sub_name, names(seurat_list[seurat_idx]), "AllCells", "AllStats", "DEGs.csv", sep = "-")
  )
)
datatable_download_exp(results)
```

```{r}
DEGs <- c(HET, HOM, WT, HET_plus_HOM, HOM_plus_WT, WT_plus_HET)

design <- data.frame(genotype = sce$genotype)
rownames(design) <- colnames(sce)
results <- results[match(rownames(sce), rownames(results)), ]

p_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.HET...HOM = results$P.value.HET...HOM,
    P.value.HET...WT = results$P.value.HET...WT,
    P.value.HOM...WT = results$P.value.HOM...WT
  )
)
p_adj_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.adj.HET...HOM = results$P.value.adj.HET...HOM,
    P.value.adj.HET...WT = results$P.value.adj.HET...WT,
    P.value.adj.HOM...WT = results$P.value.adj.HOM...WT
  )
)

polar <- polar_coords(
  design$genotype, t(logcounts(sce)), p_mat, p_adj_mat, labs = unique(design$genotype)
)

if (any(is.na(DEGs))) {
  radial_ggplot(polar, 2, colour_code_labels = TRUE, marker_size = 2)
} else {
  radial_ggplot(polar, 2, label_rows = DEGs, colour_code_labels = TRUE, marker_size = 2)
}
```

```{r}
seurat_idx <- 2

seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]@active.ident <- factor(
  seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$genotype, c("WT", "HET", "HOM")
)
```

### All Cells

```{r}
sce <- SingleCellExperiment(list(counts = GetAssayData(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], slot = "counts")))
sce$sample <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$sample
sce$genotype <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(logcounts(sce), design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", method = "global", F.adjust = "BH"
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
results <- results[ , -1]
results <- results[order(results$F.p.value), ]

write.csv(
  results,
  file.path(
    results_dir,
    "comb",
    "04-DEGs",
    paste(sub_name, names(seurat_list[seurat_idx]), "AllCells", "AllStats", "DEGs.csv", sep = "-")
  )
)
datatable_download_exp(results)
```

#### Radial and 3D Volcano Plots

```{r}
DEGs <- c(HET, HOM, WT, HET_plus_HOM, HOM_plus_WT, WT_plus_HET)

design <- data.frame(genotype = sce$genotype)
rownames(design) <- colnames(sce)
results <- results[match(rownames(sce), rownames(results)), ]

p_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.HET...HOM = results$P.value.HET...HOM,
    P.value.HET...WT = results$P.value.HET...WT,
    P.value.HOM...WT = results$P.value.HOM...WT
  )
)
p_adj_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.adj.HET...HOM = results$P.value.adj.HET...HOM,
    P.value.adj.HET...WT = results$P.value.adj.HET...WT,
    P.value.adj.HOM...WT = results$P.value.adj.HOM...WT
  )
)

polar <- polar_coords(
  design$genotype, t(logcounts(sce)), p_mat, p_adj_mat, labs = unique(design$genotype)
)

if (any(is.na(DEGs))) {
  radial_ggplot(polar, 2, colour_code_labels = TRUE, marker_size = 2)
} else {
  radial_ggplot(polar, 2, label_rows = DEGs, colour_code_labels = TRUE, marker_size = 2)
}
```

**Interactive**

```{r, dpi = 96}
radial_plotly(polar, 2)
volcano3D(polar, 2)
```
